message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 feels fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price closer to my budget. How about $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $10,750?
